tried to open in divx and media player classic. itll open but wont play... what do i do i am new at this

@badf - You could mess around trying to tie new codecs to your existing players. Not difficult for many, extremely painful for others. 
Or you could just go get a copy of VLC. It's free, and plays everything. I used to go back and forth between media players that worked for separate file types. Now I just use VLC, all the time. Plus if something is ever out of sync with the audio, you can use the J and K buttons to toggle the sounds before or after the video, so a couple button pushes and you're usually right where you need to be.
Nice up Hack, although the last one wasn't bad. I actually prefer them a little out of sync, just to make the crybabies troll away at how awful it is. Fun to watch them whine when all they had to do to solve it was use VLC.
